author: Jean M. "Jean Miller"

review: I wanted to love the Fire Stick, but I am disappointed.  Out of the box, the remote was hard to open.  Once I plugged it into the TV the quality of video playback was not good. I checked the settings to ensure they were set to the highest quality, but it still looked like SD not HD. I tried it on two different TVs with the same result.  I did not use the fire stick for 3 days and then when I finally went to try to use it again, the remote lagged behind my button presses almost an entire minute. I was unable to play any videos because the remote was almost useless.  I may have just received a bad unit, but it is going back to Amazon.
